abstract: The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation’s trust has sold 36,056 of its Class B shares of Warren E. Buffet’s Berkshire Hathaway so far in 2009 to comply with tax laws, The Associated Press said.
lead_paragraph: The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation’s trust has sold 36,056 of its Class B shares of Warren E. Buffet’s Berkshire Hathaway so far in 2009 to comply with tax laws, The Associated Press said.
